Bird Wars Roost
DashboardBattlesDevices

Devices

Manage registered Playdate devices

API Usage

How to authenticate your Playdate device

1. Register Device

POST /api/register
Content-Type: application/json

{ "displayName": "My Playdate" }

2. Use Token in Requests

POST /api/battles
Authorization: Bearer <your-secret-token>
Content-Type: application/json

{ "mapData": {...} }

3. Submit Turns

POST /api/turns
Authorization: Bearer <your-secret-token>
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "battleId": "abc123",
  "actions": [
    { "type": "move", "unitId": "u1", "from": {"x":1,"y":2}, "to": {"x":3,"y":2} },
    { "type": "attack", "unitId": "u1", "targetId": "enemy1" },
    { "type": "end_turn" }
  ],
  "gameState": { ... }
}
